message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $10,500 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we meet at $11,500?
